column4: how do i install ubuntu using a mounted image with the livecd?
i have the livecd that will not install properly, so i am downloading the image again
i want to mount it and then install it from that source
well, i want to just mount this image and do it
i asked how to do it a seperate way
its not my fault he didnt read my second question and just assumed
nevertheless, we are all volunteers here. if you have that type of attitude, you won't get any help at all. he was trying to help you.
my first question proved looks to be a bitch to do, so i asked a second way to do it
it still doesn't justify your manners (or lack of)
because of my job i am used to dealing with people a certain way
you goto afghanistan and fight guerillas and see what not paying attention gets you
i'm a marine, there is no problem
nevertheless, it doesn't justify how you dealt with this.
